alert.note: Alert for Matanuska Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 25 at 4:40AM AKST until December 27 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and freezing rain with significant icing possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches north and east of Palmer, including Sutton and Chickaloon. Ice accumulations of up to three tenths of an inch possible for the entire Valley. * WHERE...Matanuska Valley. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could be extremely hazardous. The hazardous conditions could impact holiday travel on Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop Saturday night and transition to freezing rain during the day Sunday. The heaviest precipitation is expected Sunday afternoon. Freezing rain could turn back to snow before diminishing Sunday night.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
